name: Twine Game: Earth & Me
description: Technology along with air pollution, fossil fuels, and greenhouse gas emissions are one of the many leading causes of climate change. However, the internet is a technology that interconnects society within seconds. Eloise and her team are to execute a website that protests climate reform and encourages the public to be more environmentally conscious. Will the team succeed in persuading not only citizens around the world but politicians and other government figures that hold status within their country? Find out by playing Earth & Me!
